website_summaries.verdict: Stable, well-padded shoe that works best on trails, but works for roads too.
pros: Reinforced toe holds up to tough terrain
cons: A narrow toe box doesn't work for wide feet

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Online Purchases I've Made.
customer_reviews.text: So, I normally don't buy fitness shoes online, because you never know how they'll fit. I needed a pair of trail runners on short notice and didn't have time to go shopping so I just ordered these. I love the New Balance brand so I clicked order and crossed my fingers. I received them and was super surprised at how well they fit and how comfortable they are. Plenty of cushioning and the soles are perfect for hiking. I went on a hike the day after I received these, hopping across streams, walking across rocks and walking uphill in mud and the grip was awesome. Great shoe and I would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for trail running and hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some shoes for hiking this summer on our vacation and after lots of research, I decided on these. I didn't want traditional hiking shoes but I needed something that could handle rocky, uneven terrain. I run about 2-6 miles most days on a gravel trail and these shoes have been amazing! I can tell a huge difference in the traction between these and normal running shoes. I've already worn them on some local hiking trails, and I'm looking forward to seeing how they hold up on some of the more challenging trails this summer. Either way, I'm already impressed and plan to stick with a New Balance trail running style shoe from now on for my daily running.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli H.

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes but disappointed with New Balance for using ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a loyal New Balance customer. Purchasing New Balance for ALL my tennis shoes for the past 15 years. I love the shoes but disappointed with New Balance for using cheap materials. I purchased the shoes a month ago and have mostly worn inside for in home workouts. There are two holes around the ankles due to cheap fabric. I will defiantly think twice before ordering another pair of new balance shoes in the future. Just not worth the money.... SEE PICS before purchase....
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle Toes

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers do not last
customer_reviews.text: These are the poorest quality sneaker I have purchased. Within in a couple months they started to tear in the same place on both shoes, I've attached a picture. I bought them 5 months ago, they started to tear within 2 and sadly, I am not tough on sneakers. Do not buy these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just what a runner needed
customer_reviews.text: I usually run 3-4 times a week, 4-5 miles at a time. So I go through running shoes quickly. I purchased these on a whim since my present pair of shoes began to give me blisters and I didn't have the time to run to the mall and try on 20 pairs of shoes. I was and still am pleasantly surprised. The cost was a steal!. The fit, perfect and the comfort closer to a pair of $150.00 shoes. Will buy them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Handbags galore

customer_reviews.title: Head-turners with subtlety.  Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: NB shoes recommended by podiatrists for their fit, not fashion. This pair, however, are the best looking sneaks I've ever had by New Balance. Black, Grey, Violet, with black and violet woven laces. The "N" on the side is silver reflective...I love them! The memory foam foot bed is so comfy. Trail-gripping sole actually works quite well for the streets in my neighborhood which aren't in great shape. Only had them for 3 days, but don't want to wear any others- and eantbti take a LONG hike in them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and outdoor runs that are a little muddy or dirty. The sizing is exact
customer_reviews.text: I wear these on light/easier trails and outdoor runs that are a little muddy or dirty. The sizing is exact! I wear a 7.5 in nearly every brand and these fit great. I live in on Oahu so it doesn’t get cold or icy, so I can’t attest to any extreme conditions, but so far, for just a little trail running, these are perfect. They would not take the place of hiking boots, so don’t mistake that. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TheUgliestDuckling

customer_reviews.title: No grip at all. If it rains, I ...
customer_reviews.text: No grip at all. If it rains, I slip on wet concrete. If I workout in them, I slip and loose tractions. Unsafe for my knees and an accident waiting to happen. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great trail runners!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I don't actually run, but these are great for short hikes and slippery ground. They look cute and normal with leggings so that I can also wear them for long walking days off the trail, unlike my last pair of trail runners (which were great, but ugly). Didn't feel like a goober walking around and had great grip (both on the street and hiking). I'm typically a size 7 and the size 7 fit comfortably with no break-in period. They didn't rub in the back or anything. They do sit quite low on your ankle. Can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: ADP

customer_reviews.title: Not enough arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these, but they provide minimal arch support. I tried these on along with another pair of Salomons and I could easily tell my leg/knee were rotating in with these shoes on. I will say they are very comfortable! Like walking on a cloud! If you're so inclined to buy you could simply put in arch supports, but in my case I just sent these back. I do use NB's for other activities.
customer_reviews.author: GSDLover

customer_reviews.title: They are comfy. I am certain I ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are comfy. I am certain I ordered the size 9 but I received the 10 instead. Because of this, I cannot speak to size (I went ahead and wore them anyways). The reason I am only giving these three stars is because within a few wears the material at the ankle had already worn a hole. This is compared to a pair of asics that I have owned for a year which have not holes at all. Maybe this was because of more room at my ankle, I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love.
customer_reviews.text: These are GORGEOUS. I’m so obsessed with them. They are a little wider than my other pairs of new balance, even though I ordered regular. If you have extremely narrow feet, these probably won’t be for you. My feet are pretty “average”, and I don’t think I’ll mind a little bit of extra room. I am not a huge runner, but do exercise a lot in different ways and love playing sports. These are perfect and so attractive. Really ridged bottoms so they’d be great for outdoor running or hiking. I want to buy them again for when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running sneakers
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE BEST ROAD/TRAIL RUNNING SNEAKERS EVER!!! I am pleasantly surprised how they fit perfectly and feel light on my feet, yet the sole is rugged enough for the road and trails I run. I run 4 to 5 miles daily on dirt trails and/or road and my feet feel secure, cushioned and well protected. My pet peeve for some trail sneakers is rocks get stuck in the bottom of the shoe - not with these! My only complaint is that I wish the tongue of the shoe was a bit longer otherwise, I look forward to my next pair!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I tried them yesterday on both trail and street running for about 5 miles, I definitely prefer them on the trail but they were fine for the sections of my run that were on the street. I’ve been training for a half marathon with rotating between older ASICS, addidas boost and Nike’s. I bought these to have some newer shoes for race day. They’re room-especially in the toe box (which I like) but supportive. For the price, you can’t beat them. They’re also cute with shorts, sometimes hard to find running shoes that don’t make short legs look stalky with shorts
customer_reviews.author: Meagan J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but certainly the quality of a generic Walmart shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but certainly the quality of a generic Walmart shoe, not a New Balance shoe. Within less than a week, just three wearings, the top of the cuff that circles the ankle began splitting and falling apart. So beginnning from the top lace hole on each side, all the way along both sides of the ankle, there are frayed, torn places that give the appearance of old, worn shoes. Ive never had this happen with any shoe, by any maker.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for running which is the main reason why I bought them. I have used them in rough terrain as well as concrete and they perform just fine, not slipping or skidding. I haven't tried them yet on wet concrete but all they are nice. I feel they have good support and a bouncy feel while running which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and comfortable. I'm enjoying wearing them daily. After reviews read, I was really excited that they were considered very narrow however, as a person with a narrow foot, they really are not very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Less attractive than pictures. Cheaply made. I have always worn an 8 in New Balance, am wearing an 8 comfortably now. These felt like I was jamming size 8 feet into a size 7 shoe. Very disappointed and now have to pay return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for trail running
customer_reviews.text: I usually love NB, but I'm very disappointed in this shoe. The sole in the forefoot is about a quarter inch thick. I've purchased trail running shoes from NB before and these are a joke. I went for a short jog and cut through a gravelly parking lot and I could feel every piece of pea gravel. Also, the "toe protect" is a layer of soft, thin rubber (spray on?) that provides no protection from anything you're going to brush up against on a trail. These look and feel fine for running errands, but are not safe for running trails.
customer_reviews.author: 47list24

customer_reviews.title: Performed Phenomenally during Trail Race 5K
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were ready to go right out of the box. I trained with them for about a month on the treadmill and experienced no issues at all. They were very comfortable and needed very minimal breaking-in. I bought them in preparation for a Trail Race 5K that I ran last weekend, and the results were even better. Even though they don't look like typical trail shoes, they performed very well on some slippery/wet KY terrain. Would definitely recommend to any beginner trail runner like myself. The price point is great and I would consider buying this exact pair again once these shoes wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I am a solid 10 and have often bought men's 9 in running shoe. I've always trusted New Balance. These have a lot of support and cushioning under the foot and the tread is perfect - I've tripped in the treads of previous trail running shoes. Noted in other reviews the low back which lead to blisters but that has not been my experience. Great color!
customer_reviews.author: Meadsup

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable roomy toebox
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of these shoes. I love shoes that have room in the toebox. The only reason I'm giving it four stars instead of five is that after just a few weeks of wear I started getting holes in the mesh of the toe. But they feel great so I will deal with my socks showing and hope the holes don't get too big too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jean

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love how these feel in their contact with the ground and how they feel to my feet.. Very different from my usual brand. Thought I would try something different for city and hiking trails. I have bunions and there is enough room in the toe box. :) I took a risk on these and am pleased. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is the shoelaces...they tend to untie...too round and slippery,
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: New Balance brand has changed sizing..
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were not very helpful. They ranged from good fit to too big. I ordered them anyway. They are too big and the box and paperwork were accidently thrown out. So now I'm stuck with a pair of shoes that I don't like and I can only wear with thicker socks than anyone would just to keep them from coming out of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Helena1999

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you use them for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and beautiful color. These are like buying white running shoes. Hard to keep clean. Laces suck on this too. Always come untied. Made with cord. Loved the pink version of this shoe but this shoe is much different. More durably made, but this color just stained so bad. If you actually trail run, you know better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great traction, light & easy to move in
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Comfy from the get go and have great traction. Wore them hiking and canyoneering all over Southern Utah and was very pleased with overall comfort, support level, and look of it. The shoes are light and easy to move in. No blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Vania

customer_reviews.title: Solid running sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great support for running ! These sneakers are not too heavy and clunky all while providing great support when landing during a run. I’m very happy with these sneakers for when I go for a jog. The grey is fashionable and easy to match with my workout gear .
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on all terrian dirt/asphalt
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe overall. It's very lightweight for an all terrian running shoe. Medium arch support which is perfect for me. I have a long arch and a slightly narrow heal. The first time, i jogged 2.5 miles on asphalt and next I ran/walked on a dirt trail. Grips on the bottom of the shoes help on uneven surfaces. I've worn them for exercise and everyday activities. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: not quite right
customer_reviews.text: they are a little smaller then my usual size.. I always order an 8 1/2 these I should of went up a half size to tight on my toe should of sent back but I didn't .. I will find someone who can wear them
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: are in horrible shape now
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of shoes hurt so much. YES, I use them for trails. But my entire foot, both of them, are in horrible shape now. I thought I just needed to break them in. They are the right size. But they have hurt down to the bone. To the point of visiting a podiatrist. I am very disappointed in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!! Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a shoe so comfy. Absorbs all shock and the wide width made every bit of difference. I usually have to size up to compensate for my wide short foot causing it to slip in the back. The 8 was tight and the 8.5 slipped so I ordered the 8 W online and it fits like a glove. I will only buy NB from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped quickly
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable and cute at first, however I've only used these a few days and there's already a rip on the inside of the shoe by the back of my heel. It now rubs against my foot and makes the shoe uncomfortable to wear. Very dissatisfied with how quickly these ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: I do like New Balance more than other shoe brands out there
customer_reviews.text: I do like New Balance more than other shoe brands out there, but am disappointed that this one has a "funny" feel in the back behind the heel near the achilles. I'm not sure what exactly is going on there so it's hard for me to explain. I like the color and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: i love these
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of new balance for running and I recently got into hiking and trail running. I was using my regular running shoes, but now that I have found these there is no going back. They grip really well and are super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: erica clement

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great fit
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe so far. Being a PE teacher, I go through shoes like water! These are by far my favorite, too bad they don’t make them anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on a 14 mile hike and they were pretty great. They run fairly true to size, maybe just a tad large. I wore them a few times to break them in but they really didn't need it. As others have mentioned- these are NOT normal running shoes. They are grippy on the bottom and are meant to be worn walking or running on trails, not on treadmills or pavement. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I walk/run 5+ miles daily and the support in these is terrible. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: There is no cushion/padding around the heel!!!!!! I splurged on NEW BALANCE because my heel has been bothering me, I walk/run 5+ miles daily and the support in these is terrible. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: markflyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have so much trouble finding shoes that fit my small (Women's 5.5), but wide feet, without making my feet hurt. These shoes have done it! They are so light and comfortable, even after playing 5 games of softball! Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Park

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: Eh I returned the first pair because I thought they were too big and received the second pair (smaller size) and had the same issue. I realized the issue is that the heel isn’t tight enough and therefore my heel slips as I run. I likely won’t use these for running.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and usually need the widest size available. A perfect fit for my feet is usually 7.5 WW in dress shoes. For tennis shoes, depending how wide it is, I can go from 8-8.5 W. Got 8.5D and the shoes fit very comfortably for me. I went on a hike without breaking them in and they didn't hurt my feet. Great support too! Glad I got them and the price was in my budget as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not great for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not great for running. The backs are very low and pointed at the heels, it left me with blisters and uncomfortably narrow.
customer_reviews.author: FashionLemonade

customer_reviews.title: Love NB Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first pair so much that I was thrilled to find them again. I am a long time NB shoe wearer. Love them because they fit well with my orthotics. I by a size up for fit. Normally wear an 8.5 M but buy a 9 M.
customer_reviews.author: Cliftongal

customer_reviews.title: VERY Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe based on the other reviews that it provided good padding and was comfortable. I can say, the exact opposite is true. The material is very stiff, and the support hits in the wrong places. After wearing them for one hour my feet were literally aching. Unfortunate, I used to have good luck with NB shoes - back to Asics Gel Kayano I go.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: To me, they run a little more snugly than other NB trail shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 C/D in most NB shoes, but these run a bit tight in the toe area of the shoe. It's a shame, since I love the look, and they feel great everywhere else. For reference for others in regards to fit, my current favorite New Balance shoes are the WT610V5 trail shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nyreak

customer_reviews.title: These are great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes,but not great for running,due to the texture of the sole. I put in nearly 7 miles with them and the last part was really painful in my lower back. My other shoes dont give me this problem.
customer_reviews.author: summerfun

customer_reviews.title: new balance rocks.
customer_reviews.text: remember that new balance run a size smaller than Nike and most other brands. i wear a 10 and got a 10.5 but should have gotten an 11. great looking shoes. comfortable. love the price!
customer_reviews.author: A. RUSS

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Wide enough for my custom made orthotics but after removal and washing the cloth is breaking down on the inside. Very comfortable though. Should’ve got a narrow. Just thought wide would be best.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Go up one size! I love these sneakers and bought three pairs. They don’t make them anymore. The new version is lower on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my New Balance 715's but they don't have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my New Balance 715's but they don't have the soles necessary for hiking. These have very good tread and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, practical hiker sneaks
customer_reviews.text: Love NB, great traction on the bottom. Bit more snug on one foot at the top than expected though and something rough on the inside of the same area hopefully it gets more comfortable with each wear. Color is great, vibrant pink and gray contrast is very attractive
customer_reviews.author: CC Nj

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES,I HAVE TWO DOGS THAT NEED WALKING EVERY DAY,JUST ABOUT.MY PEDIATRIST TOLD ME THAT NEW BALNCE ARE THE BEST SHOES TO GO WALKING IN DAILY!IM SO HAPPY THAT THEY CAME IN THIS HOT PINK! I LUV EM! THEY ARE VERY COMFORTABLE AND AND REALLY LIGHT IN WEIGHT!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear New Balance these were a little tighter than my usual and the backs seem lower than usual. I am a nurse and need comfy shoes, I will wear these on days that I know are less busy than usual. Okay but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Holtman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the trails!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review these until after I wore them for a 25k. I was very happy. The fit was as expected. They were lightweight and comfortable on my feet. It rained the night before and morning of the trail race so the course was muddy and slippery and these shoes were up to the challenge. Good traction all around even on the worst climbs and nasty downs. I was concerned because the price was exceptionally low for trail shoes but I'm very impressed. Didn't even get any debris in my shoes. They are def a neutral shoe so if you need support these are probably not a good option but otherwise a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy. Just got them on Saturday. I wore them all day they are stylish and comfy, perfect for my runs. I wore them without socks and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Was able to get women’s size 5.
customer_reviews.text: Like them a lot, from the appearance to the comfort to the price. Has one tiny tiny bulge/flaw where 2 fabrics come together that I can live with but other than that thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I got these in December and within 2 months the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these in December and within 2 months the arches have already worn down. The fabric has rubbed off the heel and is now making blisters. I don't buy a pair of tennis shoes expecting to replace them every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and has perfect grip for any kind of rocks ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits exactly as advertised. I always get a 1/2 size bigger for running shoes so I got an 8 (vs the 7.5 I wear in regular shoes). Very comfortable and has perfect grip for any kind of rocks or terrain. I did a 4.5mile race the first time I wore them and no blisters and were very comfortable the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Monroe-Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I was happy at first, this is a solid, cute running shoe for a good deal, but I've had this just over a month and it's already ripped. I mainly walk in them with occasional jogging
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty true to size for any athletic shoe and these didn’t disappoint. They fit exactly as expected. They’re light but but seem sturdy enough for trail running (I tend to like lighter shoes for running)... only time will tell when I go on my first hike. I love the droplet color! The picture is spot on, it’s a sort of mint green with hot pink accents. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star is there was a small tear on the tongue of the shoe. It’s a bit annoying that it’s there, but it’s a superficial snag in the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy but sweaty
customer_reviews.text: Just wore for daytime walking. They fit ok, but make my feet cold and sweaty. A bit disappointed. I would guess they are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: melissa holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a bit loose, but love new balance.
customer_reviews.text: I love new balance; but I need more arch support and these seemed a bit loose, width wise not length wise. Also they were a bit slippery on linoleum, they are cute and I went back to my original style.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, horrible laces
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and wide enough which is what I needed. Didn't give the 5th star because of the laces. Surely shoe companies can come up with laces that aren't so slippery you have to tie knots in them. Will be replaced ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good show for those that do a few mud runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is true to size in length but runs wide which is why I returned it. Seems to be a good show for those that do a few mud runs here and there but not full on competitors
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: ... want to pack large hiking boots and was very pleased. Provided much more support and traction than regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hiking in Arizona because I didn't want to pack large hiking boots and was very pleased. Provided much more support and traction than regular tennis shows without the stiffness and weight of hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would have liked a more rounded toe
customer_reviews.text: Very little support, had to buy Dr Scholls inserts. Also a little narrow, would have liked a more rounded toe. Some bottom grip but not as much as would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from day 1
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently wearing these kicks while working as a paramedic in a busy ER. Very comfortable starting from day 1. Fits as expected. I wear a women's size 10 and I ordered a 10.5. They are slightly large for me so I probably could of ordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Fell like I was wear socks and no shoes
customer_reviews.text: Buy one size bigger than your usual size unless you wear only NB. This shoe is light! Fell like I was wear socks and no shoes, lol
customer_reviews.author: cem

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Outdoor Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my new outdoor running shoes...after foot surgery every sneaker killed my feet EXCEPT these. They have converted me to New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and very comfortable! I have Planta Fasciitis and my insets I have to wear fit into the sneaker without removing the shoe pad. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom &Terry

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seems fine for an average pair of sneakers. Initially the right shoe felt significantly tighter than the left, I don't know if was my foot or the shoe being a tad smaller. Now they feel fine, either my foot was swollen or the shoe stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: They are super bright and have good tread on them for gravel ...
customer_reviews.text: They are super bright and have good tread on them for gravel roads that I am running on. So far so good for a week. I will post when I wear them long enough to be able to give a better feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Amanre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second pair, kept a watch for the price to drop again and bought the 2nd at a very good price. Couldn't pass it by due to my first being so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: No grip especially during wet conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Do not wear these if the floor is wet. The shoe is completely useless. No grip whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kennethvisag

customer_reviews.title: Good Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sneaker with a wider profile (sole). This one was better than most. The shoes are comfortable and I like the tread.
customer_reviews.author: themiddlesister

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the poisonberry color. Had no clue they glow in the dark! These are comfortable and attractive. I haven't tried them on rough terrain but they have done well on pavement. So far happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not as supportive.
customer_reviews.text: This model was not as supportive in the arch and toe box as the New Balance 410v5 model, which I kept. The light icy blue color was fun though and I was sad that color wasn't I the 410v5 model. It did run true to size though.
customer_reviews.author: DJB21

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, but don't appear to be very sturdy. Only time will tell if they hold up under the duress of Trail use
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: The round laces suck and they don't stay tied unless you double knot them.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has rounded laces so they do not stay tied. Had the same shoe in a different color and had no problem with the laces but the gray it's a different story. Definitely not digging the round laces.
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat heavy...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe...excellent price, however, upon wearing these shoes for the first couple of times, I found these shoes to be somewhat heavy to run with. My legs seemed to tire easily. I wanted this purchase to work so bad as I was looking for a great trail running shoe, unfortunately, I will have to continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Wide!
customer_reviews.text: Love that New balance offers wide and they are wide! I need the toe box wide and have tried several other brands that just can’t compete.
customer_reviews.author: Keith’s wife

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only worn them once to work, but I like them so far. They fit well right out the box. Love the color. So far, I’m happy with my purchase and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsie1

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great, i came across them after a failed delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, i came across them after a failed delivery of Puma sneakers ordered from Amazon and i will say i love them, they are very comfy and the size fits well. I would recommend anyone to get these shoes, i use them for running since i live in New York city and its all concrete with not so many running parks.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but fell short for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe overall was nice but the fit for me just didn't work. Otherwise, it would be worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fly!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up after another pair of New Balances I bought pinched my toes. They are PERFECT! Super comfortable and so fly!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Blackledge

customer_reviews.title: ... could of got an 8 but the sneakers feel great without them n my feet have not been hurting
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work I'm always on my feet I took the insole out because I didn't want to send it back for one size up I got a size 7 1/2 I could of got an 8 but the sneakers feel great without them n my feet have not been hurting. If ur considering buying them get a 1/2 size bigger. Another plus they look so cute n bright lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrealee RosadoRivera

customer_reviews.title: The shoe did not do it for me
customer_reviews.text: I found the shoe uncomfortable after a few hours of wear. I think that in my case, pronation was the problem
customer_reviews.author: Dianne G. Houston

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They're perfect for me (practically flat, 12D feet). I get the support I need, I could walk all day in these. They hold up to nursing shifts too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I felt these on my feet, I ordered another pair for back up. Having flat feet makes me appreciate a good fitting shoe. I also love the colors of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mom w/2boys

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my actually size. When I first put them on they felt a like tight, wore them for a day and they were very comfortable. I guess I just needed to break them in. Awesome sneaker for the $$ value.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyK

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like the colors in person. The sole had some glow in the dark aspects that I felt were a little childish.
customer_reviews.author: Christy P.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love them. I have never liked this brand due to look. But I have been having really bed shin splints due to nike not having the support I need for my high arches. These are made for outdoor use but I use both in the gym and outdoors. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The front of it has a rubber coating that helps from getting the top part of your shoe dirty or stained. But most importantly the fit is perfect and true to size plus the insole is super comfy. Will be buying this shoe again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: anna solano

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not as much traction support as I was hoping for, but I hardly wore them in before I went hiking, and haven't had any problems! Comfortable, stylish and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on quality
customer_reviews.text: I always buy 1/2 size larger than I wear in other brands. This fits just like I expected. However, the mesh across the top of the foot felt cheaply made, I felt like the area across my big toes would have holes in no time, so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super aggressive sole, which is great for an of the path walk. Very comfortable and breathe well!
customer_reviews.author: pbjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but not built well
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend said that these are the most comfortable shoes she's ever worn. Sadly, they don't seem to hold up. Both shoes are threadbare on the very top of the sides after just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel tight at first but then fit PERFECTLY! So comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: JJenkins

customer_reviews.title: "New" shoes were actually used
customer_reviews.text: When I received these shoes they been used before as the soles were dirty and the shoes were dirty themselves, but they were sold as new. Not to mention there was some long black hair in the shoes themselves and there were creases along the top where the previous "owner" had wore them so long they were broken in. It was disgusting and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra still

customer_reviews.title: Large shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little wide and the shoe is very large making your foot look bigger than it is. The color and style is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Soooo comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I went up a whole size in these shoes but they fit perfectly. I love them. Soooo comfortable and stylish. Came speedily. Great transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Medina

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 690v2 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Turn it up a notch in the All Terrain trail 690v2. With lightweight yet protective materials, a gusseted tongue and an improved rugged All Terrain outsole, this model is the winning combination of speed, traction and attitude.
